description: Demonstrates cascade-level soundings - runs entire cascade multiple times with different approaches and picks best

soundings.evaluator_instructions:
You are an expert problem-solving evaluator. Compare these three complete solution approaches based on:
1) Correctness - Does it solve the problem accurately?
2) Completeness - Does it cover all aspects?
3) Clarity - Is the solution well-explained?
4) Innovation - Is the approach creative and effective?

Select the BEST complete solution.

phases.name: analyze
phases.instructions:
Analyze this problem: {{ input.problem }}

Provide a thoughtful analysis. Consider different angles and be creative in your approach - each run should explore different perspectives.

phases.name: solve
phases.instructions:
Based on your analysis, provide a complete solution to: {{ input.problem }}

Be thorough and creative. Different approaches are encouraged!

phases.name: validate
phases.instructions:
Review your solution and validate it works correctly.

Provide:
1. A summary of your approach
2. Why this solution works
3. Any potential edge cases or limitations

Store your final validated solution using set_state.
